CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( BEGINS(Product2.ProductCode, "1"), ISPICKVAL(Service_Frequency__c, "28 Days"), OR( CONTAINS(Product2.Name, "Arom"), CONTAINS(Product2.Name, "EcoAire"), CONTAINS(Product2.Name, "FreshAire"), CONTAINS(Product2.Name, "EcoClean"), CONTAINS(Product2.Name, "Anti-Splash"), CONTAINS(Product2.Name, "AutoFlush Combo"), CONTAINS(Product2.Name, "Urinal Mat"), CONTAINS(Product2.Name, "Ultraire"))), "(Strong)",
IF( AND( BEGINS(Product2.ProductCode, "1"), ISPICKVAL(Service_Frequency__c, "56 Days"), OR( CONTAINS(Product2.Name, "Arom"), CONTAINS(Product2.Name, "EcoAire"), CONTAINS(Product2.Name, "FreshAire"), CONTAINS(Product2.Name, "EcoClean"), CONTAINS(Product2.Name, "Anti-Splash"), CONTAINS(Product2.Name, "AutoFlush Combo"), CONTAINS(Product2.Name, "Urinal Mat"))), "(Regular)",
IF( AND( BEGINS(Product2.ProductCode, "1"), OR( ISPICKVAL(Service_Frequency__c, "120 Days"), ISPICKVAL(Service_Frequency__c, "56 Days")), CONTAINS(Product2.Name, "Ultraire")), "(Regular)",
IF( AND( OR( BEGINS(Product2.ProductCode, "1-04-40"), BEGINS(Product2.ProductCode, "1-04-41"), BEGINS(Product2.ProductCode, "1-04-42")), ISPICKVAL(Service_Frequency__c, "182 Days")), "",
IF( AND( OR( BEGINS(Product2.ProductCode, "1-04-71"), BEGINS(Product2.ProductCode, "1-04-72"), BEGINS(Product2.ProductCode, "1-04-73"), BEGINS(Product2.ProductCode, "1-08-01"), BEGINS(Product2.ProductCode, "1-08-02"), BEGINS(Product2.ProductCode, "1-08-03")), ISPICKVAL(Service_Frequency__c, "Annually")), "",
"("&TEXT(Service_Frequency__c)&")")))))
CustomField.label: Service Frequency mod
